testcase.name: Test03
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Signup / Login' button.................................passed Then Verify 'Login to your account' is visible..............................passed Then Enter incorrect email address and password.............................passed Then user clicks 'login' button.............................................passed Then Verify error 'Your email or password is incorrect!' is visible.........passed
